doc:
Justine Johnstone https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Justine_Johnstone 0 Justine Johnstone (January 31, 1895 – September 4, 1982) was an American stage and silent screen actress, pathologist and expert on syphilis. Working under her married name, Justine Wanger, she was part of the team that developed the modern intravenous drip technique. Justine_Johnstone ( January_31_,_1895 – September_4_,_1982 ) was an_American_stage and silent_screen_actress , pathologist_and_expert on syphilis . Working under her_married_name , Justine_Wanger , she was part of the_team that developed the_modern_intravenous_drip_technique .
